snippet: She has smarts and guts, but she needs to make clear that she can be a strong regulator of Wall Street.
abstract: Editorial praises Pres Obama's nomination of Mary Jo White as next chairwoman of Securities and Exchange Commission; contends White must make case for how she will use her formidable professional qualities to advance SEC's mission of protecting individual investors by ensuring that markets are transparent, well regulated and vigorously policed.
lead_paragraph: She has smarts and guts, but she needs to make clear that she can be a strong regulator of Wall Street.

headline.seo: Mary Jo White at the S.E.C.
headline.main: Mary Jo White at the S.E.C.
headline.print_headline: Mary Jo White at the S.E.C.
